text: Odinani is the traditional religion of the Igbo people of southern Nigeria.Afulezy, Uju "On Odinani, the Igbo Religion" , Niger Delta Congress, Nigeria, April 03, 2010 Odinani has monotheistic and panentheistic ideas. It has one God as the source of all things. ==References== Category:Religions Category:Nigerian culture
title: Odinani
